label: AL rdfs:label@en
conclusion topic: C 'has specified output' some ('conclusion based on data' and ('is about' some %)) SPLIT=|
participant under investigation: C 'has participant' some (% and ('has role' some 'participant under investigation role'))

label: investigation
definition: a planned process that consists of parts: planning, study design execution, documentation and which produce conclusion(s).
example of usage: Lung cancer investigation using expression profiling, a stem cell transplant investigation, biobanking is not an investigation, though it may be part of an investigation
curator note: Could add specific objective specification|Following OBI call November 2012,26th: it was decided there was no need for adding achieves objective of drawing conclusion as existing relations were providing equivalent ability. this note closes the issue and validates the class definition to be part of the OBI core editor = PRS
has part: documenting|drawing a conclusion based on data|study design execution|('planning' and 'has specified output' some 'study design')

label: hypothesis-driven investigation
definition: is an investigation with the goal to test one or more hypothesis

label: hypothesis generating investigation
definition: is an investigation in which data is generated and analyzed with the purpose of generating new hypothesis

label: surveillance process
definition: An investigation in which some entity is monitored, and data concerning that entity collected, interpreted, and disseminated, for the purpose of managing, directing, or protecting that entity, or some other entity.

label: case-control investigation
definition: An investigation that has participants that bear either a case or control role and which examines the hypothesis that the presence of the outcome in case participants is associated with an exposure that is not associated with control participants.

label: observational investigation
definition: An investigation in which subjects are monitored in the absence of any active intervention by experimentalists.

label: longitudinal investigation
definition: An investigation that involves repeated observations of the same variables (e.g., people) over long periods of time.

label: nested case-control investigation
definition: A case–control investigation in which cases and controls are drawn from the population in a fully enumerated cohort.

label: animal investigation
definition: An investigation that has non-human animals as its subjects.

label: clinical investigation
definition: An investigation on human subjects with the objective to produce information on human health.

label: observational clinical investigation
definition: A clinical investigation that does not involve an intervention.

label: clinical trial
definition: A clinical investigation that involves an intervention.

label: phase I clinical trial
definition: A clinical trial that produces information about the safety of a drug and the adverse events associated with that drug, and which is typically conducted with healthy participants.

label: phase II clinical trial
definition: A clinical trial that produces information about a drug's effectiveness and short-term adverse events associated with the drug.

label: phase III clinical trial
definition: A clinical trial that produces information about a drug's safety and effectiveness in different populations, with different dosages, and in combination with other drugs.
